Packs money, important papers, and clothes efficiently and quickly, acting with focused urgency.

Drives cautiously to avoid attracting police attention, showing an awareness of the risks involved.

Nervously complies with the patrolman's request, showing openness and cooperation despite fear.
Feels anger and fear at her own guilt and inability to act normally, indicating self-awareness and emotional sensitivity.

Eventually produces her wallet and cooperates with the patrolman's request, following the protocol correctly.
Recognizes her own shaken state and the trouble she caused herself by acting under guilt and fear, showing some self-awareness.
Despite being disturbed and frightened, she regains enough control to safely drive and skillfully evades being followed by the patrolman by turning off the highway at the right moment.
Glances worried at the front page of the newspaper, showing concern about current events.
Distractedly walks back to the car lot while engrossed in the newspaper, missing the patrolman nearby.

Forces herself to stop hearing imagined voices and continues driving despite guilt and worry.

Responds to internal anxiety by increasing driving speed in difficult conditions (dusk, oncoming headlights).

Not fully engaging in conversation or probing further about the place, showing reserved but purposeful behavior.
